title: "pkgreporting"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r libs, include = FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
library(DT)
```

```{r load-iss, include = FALSE}
load(here::here("data", "issues.RData"))
```

```{r url, echo = FALSE}
issues <- issues %>%
  mutate(url = str_glue("https://github.com/{owner}/{repo}/issues/{number}")) %>%
  mutate(issue = str_glue('<a href = "{url}">{title}</a>'))
```

```{r select-iss, include = FALSE}
issues_pared <- issues %>%
  select(c("repo", "issue", "reaction_p1", "reaction_other", "comments", "bug"))
```


```{r dt, echo = FALSE}
datatable(issues_pared, filter = 'bottom', escape = FALSE, options = list(pageLength = 10)) %>%
  formatStyle('reaction_p1', fontWeight = 'bold')
```
